home work about contact

office of corporate relations

skills

book design photo editing graphic design


timeline

may 2023 - december 2023

overview

i worked at the office of corporate relations for 7 months, and i had opportunities to do work in every aspect of design: email newsletters, website design, social media, book design, infographics, and more. everything we did was essential in creating and maintaining relationships between the university of illinois and various companies.

stewardship reports

some of our most important projects, stewardship reports highlight a company's involvement with the university as well as exploring opportunities for future involvement. as these were presented to the companies themselves, we had to tailor the design of each book to the company it was for. i was given the content to work with by the marketing team, and designed these layouts entirely on my own. after going through necessary edits and iteration, it is presented to the company.

social media
